name: Inner Sea (M_ALO)
description:
Discover Inner Sea

Inner Sea is a 3C prototype of a local cooperative exploration game, where two players play as ROVs. The mission of these underwater drones is to explore the ocean floor and collect samples using an articulated robotic arm. Explore together the mechanics offered by these machines in a SandBox with a variety of situations and let yourself be carried away by the curiosity of discovering unknown places!

CONTROLS Xbox Controller :

Movement & Camera:

Left Stick (LS) : Go Forward & Backward + Strafe
Left Stick Click (LS Click) : Change Lights
Right Trigger (RT) : Go Up
Left Trigger (LT) : Go Down
Right Stick - Up & Down (RS Y axis) : Look Up & Down
Right Stick - Left & Right (RS X axis) : Turn Left & Right
Right Bumper : Change Speed

Arm Controls :

Dpad Up : Arm Expansion
Dpad Down : Arm retraction
Dpad Left : Arm Rotation - Counter-clockwise
Dpad Right : Arm Rotation - Clockwise
Left Bumper (LB) : Switch Mode
Right Stick (RS) : Control Elbow
Button A (A) : Open/Close Hand
Button Y (Y) : Reset Arm's Position

Debug & Cheat :

Button B (B) : Throw Light Ball
Right Stick Click  (RS Click ) : Super Speed (Press RB to reset Speed)
Select : Teleport to Hub
W (On Keyboard only) : Change Scene's lighting
